summary: The "Enhance Access To SNAP Act of 2025" (EATS Act of 2025) aims to amend the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 to expand eligibility for the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP). The bill seeks to remove certain disqualifications that currently prevent eligible students in higher education from accessing SNAP benefits. It specifically addresses restrictions outlined in the Act related to student eligibility. If passed, the changes will take effect on January 2, 2026.
